EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_Meetups.April 2015 meetups - NYC targeted
EmailTemplate.subject: NYC Apache Storm Meetup on 4/20: Developing Big Data Applications with Spring XD
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Join us on April 20th for Developing Big Data Applications with Spring XD -- a free meetup hosted by the New York City Apache Storm User Group with speakers Mark Pollack and Marius Bogoevici. Learn more and register here: http://bit.ly/NYCStormUG-SpringXD-042015 <http://bit.ly/NYCStormUG-SpringXD-042015>
To show you the new features in Spring XDâ€™s latest release, we will demonstrate how easy it is to build big data applications that take advantage of the strengths of Kafka and RxJava. Similarities and differences between Spring XD and Storm will be discussed.
Learn more and register here: http://bit.ly/NYCStormUG-SpringXD-042015 <http://bit.ly/NYCStormUG-SpringXD-042015>
We're looking forward to seeing you!
